title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 54.12 - Authorized foreign and alien insurance companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 54.12 - Authorized foreign and alien insurance companies

State Regulations

No authorized foreign or alien insurer shall deliver or issue for delivery within this State any variable life insurance policy unless the insurer shall comply substantially with the provisions of this Part which, in the judgment of the superintendent, are reasonably necessary to protect the interests of the people of this State. Notes

54.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
